titles.title: Congratulating the Augusta State University Jaguars men's golf team for winning the 2010 NCAA Division I Golf Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

bill.summary: 7/19/2010--Introduced. Congratulates the Augusta State University Jaguars men's golf team on winning the 2010 NCAA Division I Golf Championship.
